objective: Identify, analyze, and propose mitigations for project risks.
instructions: 1. Review project scope, requirements, and technical decisions. 2. Identify technical risks (complexity, dependencies, unknown technologies). 3. Identify schedule risks (tight deadlines, resource constraints). 4. Identify external risks (third-party APIs, vendor dependencies). 5. Assess probability and impact for each risk (High/Medium/Low). 6. Propose mitigation strategies for high-priority risks. 7. Output a risk register document.
risk_categories: - Technical: Architecture complexity, technology maturity, integration challenges - Schedule: Time constraints, parallel dependencies, learning curves - Resource: Skill gaps, availability, knowledge silos - External: API reliability, vendor lock-in, regulatory compliance - Security: Data protection, authentication, vulnerability exposure
output_format: Create a risk register with columns: - Risk ID - Category - Description - Probability (H/M/L) - Impact (H/M/L) - Risk Score - Mitigation Strategy - Owner
